text: WIXL-LP (97.1 FM) is a radio station licensed to Madison, Wisconsin, United States, the station serves the Madison area. The station is currently owned by City Church, Inc. It broadcasts a Christian rock format. After many delays, the station went on air just ahead of an FCC deadline. ==References== ==External links== * IXL-LP IXL-LP IXL-LP Category:Radio stations established in 2007 Category:2007 establishments in Wisconsin
title: WIXL-LP
